topic.title: ZeroNet won't run inside Vagrant CentOS 7 VirtualBox: Connection reset by peer
topic.body:
https://superuser.com/questions/1189563/how-do-i-run-zeronet-in-a-vagrant-centos-7-virtualbox

I can't access the ZeroNet server even though I forwarded the port to the host and I added a guest public network.
